stages.text: You have arrived in a mysterious place, surrounded by nothing but an abandoned old shack infront of you.
Enter 'go north' to approach the shack.
In front of you lays a disbanded old white shack. It looms over you.
Laying in front of the shack is a rusted old sword, belonging to someone long, long ago.
Enter 'pickup' to pick up the item.
Enter 'go north' to enter the shack.
As you enter the shack, the floorboards begin to rumble and an undead creature bursts out from under the floor.
Ironically, as the undead creature dies, he leaves behind a potion, pickup?
As you gather your surroundings, you realise the room has 4 staircases down below one in each wall of the room.
